pipesrus

Class OrderSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pipesrus.OrderSystem

  • public class OrderSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the basket and methods for manipulating it. Used within the OrderForm to store the ongoing order.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OrderSystem()
      Constructor with no parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrderSystem

        public OrderSystem()
        Constructor with no parameters. Initialises the basket.

    • Method Detail

      • addToBasket

        public boolean addToBasket(double l,
                           double d,
                           int gO,
                           int cO,
                           boolean iI,
                           boolean oR,
                           boolean cR)
        Attempts to add a pipe with the specified credentials to the basket. Returns false if the pipe is an invalid order and doesn't add it to the basket. Works by making a pipe of each type in turn and using the valid() function. If the pipe is valid, it is added to the basket and the function returns true.
        Parameters:
        l - The length of the pipe in metres.
        d - The diameter of the pipe in inches.
        gO - The plastic grade ordered (grade 1-5).
        cO - The number of colours ordered (0, 1, or 2).
        iI - Whether or not inner insulation has been ordered (boolean).
        oR - Whether or not outer reinforcement has been ordered (boolean).
        cR - Whether or not chemical resistance has been ordered (boolean).
        Returns:
        True if pipe successfully added, otherwise false.

      • returnOrders

        public java.lang.String returnOrders()
        Returns a long string composed of all of the details strings of the pipes in the basket. Adds a number to the start of each line to identify each item in the order. Uses format '(Number of order) | (Details string) \r\n'
        Returns:
        A long string of the details of the entire order.

      • returnOrdersWithType

        public java.lang.String returnOrdersWithType()
        Same as the returnOrders() method, only the pipes type is included. Used to print the order for Pipes'R'Us. Uses format '(Number of order) | Type: | (Details string) \r\n'
        Returns:
        A long string of the details of the entire order with the pipes type.

      • orderCost

        public double orderCost()
        Returns the total order cost rounded to 2dp. Rounded to make pounds/pence.
        Returns:
        The total cost of the order so far.
